thread.title: Emma Revilles

author: Emma Revilles
title: Emma Revilles
text: The assistant was very cheerful, helpful and understanding of my difficult situation. They accommodated my needs which went slightly off their usual protocol. Couldn't have asked for better service. I would definitely use their service again and I thought the price was very reasonable. Thank you, you made my day! I wish I'd caught the assistants name but I was in a bit of a fluster due to me being 6months pregnant and making a mountain out of a mole hill. He really put me at ease, as did the gentleman on the phone at the call centre.
